actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the amount of social security benefits which are includible in income shall be determined without regard to tax-exempt interest, and for other purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that tax-exempt interest shall not be taken into account in determining the amount of social security benefits subject to tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the amount of social security benefits which are includible in income shall be determined without regard to tax-exempt interest, and for other purposes.
